lines.text: I never claim to be God, Stanley. Only close to him.
You know I could order you to work with our local contacts on this.
You could also tell me that you are tall, dark and good-looking.
You are a hard woman to deal with, Cleo.
Only in business, Stanley. Off the job I'm a real pussycat.
Hey baby, what did you tell the man to make him change his mind?
I told him he will be paid in advance and he will not have to wait. And if the tall black woman wants to throw her life away, it's no concern of ours.
Now that we got that settled. Suppose you tell me, why you followed me?
I wanted to see if you're as bad as you act.
And?
And... I've seen worse!
Cleo, for Christ's sakes, you nearly blew up half of Hong Kong!
And may blow up the other half before I'm through.
If you point that thing at me one more time, I'm gonna make you eat it! Fingernail and all!
About your report. Write it on your ass!
And we might just happen to be the only niggas alive with white shadows.
You know one thing now? That chick would bite Count Dracula on the neck.
And make him like it!
Relax child! The way I feel tonight, Muhammad Ali will have his hands full!
Don't race your motor, baby! It's not leaving the garage.

Excuse me for cuttin' in, I don't mean to be uppity or nothin'. We're talkin' about a million dollars worth of dope and some heavy cash back in the States you might want to score a lot more, provided the dope is any kind of good. Now, the last thing my people want to do is, eh, get caught up in some shoot 'em up between you and this Miss Big you're runnin' this number on. What I'm tryin' to say is, all we want is the dope.

Stanley, somebody's trying pretty hard to kill this black lady. Now, I don't know if its Chen or somebody who's trying to keep me from getting to him. But, you can bet your skinny white ass I'm going to find out. And ain't nobody gonna stop me.
I like you boys.
Did she say Roy?
Boys.

I think we will be able to do some business, later. For now, I would like to offer my personal hospitality. Feel free to relax and enjoy yourselves. We'll talk business later. Madalyna will see to you and any wants you may have. Meanwhile, I'll hold the insurance.
Take off your clothes. De girls will bathe and massage.
Say what? Ee-eh! Not me. No way!
Don't stand there and flap your lips! You can do what dick says...

Exhibit, blood. Now you know I ain't got nothin' against bathin', massagin' and definitely nothin' against makin' love. But, I likes to get down. But, when I get down I don't want to drown in no pool of water.
Didn't you hear her Dragon shit? We supposed to relax and enjoy. Now you don't want to offend that sweet little lady, do you? And put her into an evil mood.
You got it, baby!
I hope I haven't kept you waiting.
Oh, no, baby. We diggin' the sites.
All the way, baby!
Hey, what's happenin', my man?
Hey, don't give me that shit. Where the hell have you guys been?
Ha-ha. Relax, man. We're operating on C.P.T.
Yeah, that's Colored People's Time, baby.
You got the bread?
Hey, can a bird fly or what!
